data.message:
Fuck you Eminem. 
Maybe if you helped spread literacy and the importance of graduating, for the YEARS you have been the unofficial "voice of Detroit", rather than bouncing back and forth between glamorizing and condemning drug use and gang culture; you might not have to raise money, just so Flint's youth could go back to school. These kids' families would be more intact and therefore more likely to positively reinforce HEALTHY socio-economic choices. 
Something to think about...
